Member Enumeration Documentation

enum InputMapItem::MapItemType
 

Defines the Type of the InputMapItem. TYPE_KEY_DOWN - for any KeyDown event
TYPE_KEY_UP - for any KeyUp event
TYPE_KEY_AUTO_REPEAT - for auto-repeated key events (uses the KeyDownInputMap) TYPE_LONG_KEY_PRESS - for any LongKeyPress event (uses the KeyDownInputMap)
